name: Danterrifik II
overview: After a hellish first part in which our protagonist wakes up, turned into a skeleton in a dark cemetery, he discovers that he has to make his way through hell itself to recover his soul, body and identity. After a tortuous path, he manages to leave purgatory behind and finally he achieves his soul. In this second infernal installment, Dan confronts himself, lost in the labyrinth of his mind he will fight to survive between dangers and his twisted madness. Your brain has not supported it anymore and it will guide you through those paths of hell occupied by its satanic dangers plus the surreal hallucinations of our protagonist, and that is, Dan's greatest fear is Hell and others that you will have to discover ... Accompany Dan through 25 levels with his characteristic abilities, collect the pills to keep a minimum of sanity and put his brain back level to level, hell is in and out of him, an adventure that will make your hair stand on end.
